# wtf-timeline

An easy to customize, responsive vertical timeline for mobile and desktop.

- Used together with [`wtf-timeline-block` component](../wtf-timeline-block).
- See [timeline example](../../examples/timeline.html) for usage.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute                  | Description      | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------------ | -------------------------- | ---------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `colorTimelineBg`        | `color-timeline-bg`        | Background color | `string` | `undefined` |
| `colorTimelineSeparator` | `color-timeline-separator` | Separator color  | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                         | Description                  |
| ---------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `--color-timeline-bg`        | Color of timeline background |
| `--color-timeline-separator` | Color of timeline separator  |
| `--component-padding`        | Padding between components   |
| `--container-width`          | Width of container           |
| `--space-lg`                 | Large spacing                |
| `--space-md`                 | Medium spacing               |
| `--space-unit`               | Base spacing unit            |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
